post.title: BanG Dream Announces Upcoming Collaboration With Hololive
post.content:
Popular mobile rhythm game BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! has teased an upcoming collaboration with VTuber agency Hololive. The collaboration, according to the official English Twitter account of the game, will commence on August 26.

Collab with hololive is upcoming up next from Aug. 26!✨
Stay tuned!

Download for free on iOS / Android: https://t.co/12PWjIOXAa pic.twitter.com/4Z46DxWxc2

— BanG Dream! GBP (@bangdreamgbp_EN) August 21, 2022

It should be noted that the announcement is posted on the game’s official English Twitter account, it is more likely that the collaboration will be only available to BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! English players.

Hololive has already made a collaboration with the BanG Dream! franchise back in October 2021, albeit for its Japanese players only back. The collaboration back then saw three Hololive talents: Minato Aqua, Tokino Sora, and Shirakami Fubuki–partake in the collaboration. Aside from perks and merchandise, fans also enjoyed collaboration song covers made by Hololive and the characters in-game.

node.description: A few weeks ago, we reported that AniManGaki 2022, one of the biggest annual anime/cosplay/gaming events in Malaysia, will showcase 80 VTubers.
